issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
iOS 9 has released an API allowing iOS search to extend into 3rd party developed applications. Appcelerator Titanium needs to support the inclusion of these APIs into Titanium SDK.

We should also make sure to look into the Android Search API to account for parity
